label.text: + /who - Check players nearby your home location
+ /bed - Teleport to your current active bed
+ /died - Teleport to your last death spot
+ /day7 - Check when is bloodmoon day/Server Fps
+ /reward - Take reward after make a server vote
+ Non-Donator can set 1 home point and 1 waypoint
+ /loot - Get random Donor reward every 3h online
+ Donator can use DNT mods and DNT items
+ Donator can set 2 home points and 4 waypoints

label.name: windowName
label.tooltip: It’s hard to beat a person who never gives up.
With money you are a dragon; with no money, a worm.

label.text: [VN] 39 DAYS PvE | CLASSES | BOSSES | HEAVY MODS | SESSION 13
+ Livemap: https://103.62.48.21:5202 login with steam account
+ Server commands list is on chat area or type /commands
+ Do not try to steal items, lure zombies to destroy other players base. Otherwise will be BAN
+ After lv 50 you will have 5 level of Death penalty when you die
+ NO Drop Mining, NO Building in water
+ NO Building in POIs or any Prefab, Do not destroy POI loot boxes
+ NO mining outside reset zone, NO plant over 20 trees
+ Duping, X-raying, abuse of invisibility glitch and alike are all not allowed
+ Dont build base in reset zone
+ Wasteland now a radiation zone, Anti-Radian Suit will help, +50% kill exp in this zone
+ You can donate for server and get awesome perks for Donator. Info on discord
+ To keep your Donor pack, you must type /donorpack at least one in EVERY wipe
+ There will be no Screamers, Drone, Vehicles storage in this server
+ Ride your vehicles, use turrets as your own risk
+ Only Burned Forest biome can spawn ores
+ Server reboot every 3 hours, reloot every 7 days in game
+ City regions are reset at 7 AM GMT+7 daily

label.name: descriptionText
label.text: OBJECTIVES NOT AVAILABLE AT THIS TIME.
